items.sentence: I want to buy a house, but I don't have enough money for a down payment.
Have you tried everything or do you still have something up your sleeve?
One of my ex-girlfriends is now dating my younger sister's ex-boyfriend.
I walked our dog this morning, but usually Tom is the one who walks her.
Having finished the delicious meal, Tom and Mary weren't hungry anymore.
Have you ever stopped to think about how things could be if we did that?
Tom will only do what he wants to do, no matter what you tell him to do.
Tom and Mary got married, even though their parents didn't want them to.
I'm driving to Boston, so whoever wants to come with me, get in the car.
Tom didn\'t think he had the stomach to tell Mary what needed to be done.
